n.u: The A to Z of TV Cooking

p.n: The A to Z of TV Cooking I (13)
p.k: Letter M Jamie Oliver prepares a mozzarella and chilli salad and the Hairy Bikers make mousakka
John Craven meets super-fundraiser Captain – now Colonel – Tom Moore
Nick Bailey gives tips on how to plan and lay out a path
Dougie and Nick are in their own kitchens cooking with fantastic Scottish produce
Carole and Brian deal with more of the viewers' home-grown questions
The best bits from Saturday Kitchen
Iran Nigel's adventure ends in a country shrouded in mystery and often in the headlines - Iran
Monica Galetti travels to the Jura Mountains in eastern France

p.n: Hairy Bikers' Best of British II (3)
p.k: Water Water Everywhere The bikers explore the food available in British waters and try fly-fishing for trout
The story of Rodrigo Medellin, who has dedicated his life to saving bats
Sylvia Syms looks at the heroes and heroines who became cinema's greatest sex symbols
A gambler (Marlon Brando) in need of cash bets that he can make any girl go out with him
Baked Beans Update Gregg Wallace catches up with the baked beans factory producing 15 million tins in a week
Gallipoli to the Syrian Border Simon visits Istanbul and the beaches of the Aegean Sea, before reaching the Syrian border
Dragon vs Dragon A pitch for a brolly-dispensing machine sets off the first spat between the Dragons
Romesh and the Ranganation take a funny, topical look at modern Britain
80% Ally's Toast Ally and Dave are off for the weekend to attend Ally's sister's wedding
80% Jail Having just signed his first record deal, Dave fights to push his own creative vision
74% Xquic Angel gets intense about intercepting Potter's precious cargo
74% Muluc Fists and firearms meet with mixed success in solving problems on a tough day
Fiona Bruce presents an hour of topical debate
Surgeons deal with a problematic twin pregnancy and a case of placenta accreta
59% Essie's friends try to keep things normal as she continues her chemotherapy
